section.title: Import and Export
section.para: The entire Guvnor repository can be exported to a file. This is useful as a backup. It can be imported in the same or another Guvnor server instance.
To export the entire repository content into a zip file, click the button Export. You 'll get a pop-up in your browser to save the zip file.
To import such a zip file, click the button Browse, select the zip file and click the button Import.
Both actions may take some time, especially if the repository is big.
